page.title: 10May Day ceremonies:Sompting
page.content: There are 24 places. Activities at the Community centre include Bingo , Youth Club, Drama Group, mother and Toddler Group, Cricket Club, Social Services. {May day ceremonies:Sompting Fifty or sixty years ago the Sompting community went to see the May Queen being crowned.The old tradition was that the children dressed up in traditional costumes and decorated a semi-circle in flowers.The May Queen rode in a horse-drawn carriage also decorated in flowers.When they got to Sompting Recreation Ground they danced.When it was lunch time they went home.After they had finished lunch they returned to the Recreation Ground and led the procession to Sompting Abbotts.When they arrived they danced for hte two failies who lived there.
